commenter_a: Fortunately the majority of police officers are good, hard working people serving/protecting their communities. Are there a few bad ones? Of course! The media really hypes the bad police officers, the knuckle heads looting and destroying communities 'in protest'. This is what I live by and teach my children. We should be brought together by love, not torn apart by hate.
